value:
$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Smile|$w0|It's time for the spring festival,
$Nu. Come on!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|$w0|Please, Sharena. You have to
slow down to explain all this
to our friend here.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|$w0|Oh, how thoughtless of me.$k$p$EFace_Smile|It's a festival held in spring,
$Nu.$k$pThus, a spring festival. There are
few festivals I adore more!$k$pLet's hurry. We have to trounce
everyone else there.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|$w0|Sh-Sharena, wait! Ugh. There
she goes again.$k$p$EFace|Well, let's catch up with her. I'll
explain more when we get
there, $Nu.$k$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|$w0|We've come to the World of
Awakening.$k$pEvery spring, this town holds a
festival in the hopes that they'll
have a bountiful harvest.$k$pThey decorate eggs in various
colors, wear rabbit costumes...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|$w0|And battle with carrots and eggs!$k$p$WmMPID_春祭クロム,ch04_00_Chrom_M_SpringFes17,Face|$w0|Welcome. Have you come to
enter the competition?$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|$w0|Oh, my. It's Prince Chrom from
the Halidom of Ylisse, geared
up for spring battle...$k$p$EFace|But we won't lose this time,
not with our good friend
$Nu with us.$k$pLet's get moving. The festival is
starting. Spring is here, and
we're going to win!$k

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_春祭クロム,ch04_00_Chrom_M_SpringFes17,Face|$w0|You're strong competitors, but
this is far from over.$k$p$WmMPID_春祭カミラ,ch05_28_Camilla_F_SpringFes17,Face|$w0|We'll hop back into battle soon.
Perhaps if we eat our carrots,
we'll come out on top?$k$pSee you all later!$k$Sbs150|
